issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Strong supporter of expanding affordable healthcare, protecting and strengthening the Affordable Care Act, and supporting Medicare for All
issues.source: Senate voting record and public statements

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Advocates for comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, and protection for DACA recipients
issues.source: Senate floor speeches and legislative proposals

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports aggressive climate change mitigation, Green New Deal principles, and transitioning to renewable energy sources

issues.title: Education Access
issues.description: Supports increased federal funding for education, student debt relief, and expanding community college and higher education opportunities

issues.title: Women's Rights
issues.description: Strong advocate for reproductive rights, equal pay, and combating gender discrimination in workplace and society
issues.source: Senate voting record and public advocacy

issues.title: Racial Justice
issues.description: Supports comprehensive police reform, addressing systemic racism, and protecting civil rights

issues.title: Economic Equity
issues.description: Advocates for raising minimum wage, supporting workers' rights, and reducing income inequality

issues.title: Foreign Policy
issues.description: Supports strong diplomatic engagement, international alliances, and strategic approach to global challenges
